response.original_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: It's a Wonderful Life, Dave
response.overview: In this touching homage to the classic film It's A Wonderful Life, poor Dave's having a string of rotten luck. When he wishes he had never been born, Alvin, Simon and Theodore show Dave in their own hilarious way that if it weren't for him, the world-famous recording stars, Alvin and the Chipmunks, would have never exist!
response.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: It's a Wonderful Life, Dave
